seo: 锐捷云课堂,目录遍历漏洞,漏洞检测,信息安全
seo_en: Ruijie Cloud Classroom,directory traversal vulnerability,vulnerability detection,information security
summary: 该插件用于检测锐捷云课堂主机是否存在pool目录遍历漏洞，防止因漏洞导致的信息泄露。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Ruijie Cloud Classroom host has a pool directory traversal vulnerability, preventing information leakage caused by the vulnerability.
